attributes.action: Start the article 50 process to leave the EU immediately
attributes.additional_details: The UK voted by a margin of 1¼ million people to leave the EU. That process must be honoured.
attributes.background: Since the democratic will of the people of the UK was overwhelmingly in favour of leaving the EU the government should action the article 50 process immediately to ensure that a cabal of undemocratic MP's and EU hangers on cannot subvert the democratic will of the British people
